specials.name: Draconic Frenzy
specials.description: Ithanotaur makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.

specials.name: Breath Weapon
specials.description: Ithanotaur breathes in one of two ways. They can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
Shadows (necromancy, primal, shadow) The dragon breathes a blast of shadows in a 40-foot cone. Each creature within the cone must attempt a DC 40 Fortitude save.

specials.name: Draconic Momentum
specials.description: Ithanotaur  recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.

specials.name: Ghost Ban
specials.description: Ithanotaur's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a ghost touch property rune, and an umbral dragon's jaws deal an additional 8d6 force damage to undead.
